item.title: SEAGULL: No-reference Image Quality Assessment for Regions of Interest via Vision-Language Instruction Tuning
item.description: SEAGULL: A novel network uses vision-language instruction tuning to assess image quality for regions of interest (ROIs) with high accuracy, leveraging masks and a new dataset for fine-grained IQA.
